name: Duck, Smash and Hop!
description:
Duck, Smash and Hop!

You are a member of the resistance during an awful war. You went on a mission, but you have been spotted by the enemy and now, you hope to ecape. The future of the resistance depends on you. Be  bold. Duck behind walls, smash the barricades and hop over the obstacles. 

Controls

Press SPACE to duck, jump and smash.

Credits

Programming: Jakub "tagis" Jakubski and Igor "Hermit" Kolasiński
Art: Jakub "WZuREUh" Brojerski
Music and asset import: Mateusz "M4athew" Dudek

Special thanks to: PixelatedMouse, Ineffable, ShermanGaming and Zaruse for the mental support and 'beta testing'

Authors' note

This game was created for 1-button-jam. It's our first project as a team of four, and for the three of us it was a first experience with gamedev and jams at all. Although the game didn't end up exactly as we planned, we gained a lot of experience which we look forward to use to create other games. Thanks for playing our game and we strongly appreciate the feedback!

- Jakub "tagis" Jakubski, Igor "Hermit" Kolasiński, Mateusz "M4athew" Dudek, Jakub "WZuREUh" Brojerski, authors of Duck, Smash and Hop!
